alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 3:05PM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...ADDITIONAL SNOW THROUGH MONDAY NIGHT FOR THE INLAND NORTHWEST... .Additional snowfall is expected for southeast Washington and central Idaho through Monday evening. Parts of the Cascade Mountains and mountain passes will see heavy snow during this time. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY FOR THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS OF THE CAMAS PRAIRIE... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow for the higher elevations of the Camas Prairie. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont, and Winchester. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
